data.text: Chuny dhano chano gik modwaro timo,
Yore duto mag dhano nenorene ni longʼo,
Ket gimoro amora mitimo e lwet Jehova Nyasaye,
Gik moko duto ma Jehova Nyasaye timo oseketo gikogi,
Jehova Nyasaye odagi ji duto man-gi sunga e chunygi.
Nikech hera kod adiera ema omiyo richo otimne misango,
Ka yore ngʼato moro Jehova Nyasaye,
Ber bedo gi matin kod tim makare,
E chuny dhano ochano yore,
Ruoth wuoyo kaka chik mar Nyasaye dwaro,
Rapim mopogore opogore makare aa kuom Jehova Nyasaye,
Ruodhi mon gi timbe maricho,
Ruodhi ohero joma wacho adiera
Mirimb ruoth en jaote mar tho,
Ka wangʼ ruoth nenore mamor to nitiere ngima,
To ber maromo nade yudo rieko moloyo dhahabu,
Yor ngʼat moriere tir kwedore gi richo;
Sunga kelo masira,
Ber bedo gi chuny mobolore e dier jochan,
Ngʼato angʼata mawinjo puonj dhi maber,
Ngʼat man-gi paro en ngʼat mariek,
Winjo wach en soko mar ngima ne jogo man kode,
Ngʼat mariek rito weche mawuok e dhoge,
Weche mag mor chalo gi mor kich
Nitie yo manenore ne dhano ni nikare,
Miluma ma jatich nigo miyo otiyo matek,
Ngʼat marach chano timo timbe maricho,
Ngʼat ma timbene richo kelo mana miero,
Ngʼat ma ja-mahundu wuondo jabute
Tangʼ gi ngʼat ma buonjo kodi nikech onyalo bet ni ochano timoni marach,
Lwar en osimbo mar duongʼ
Ngʼat ma terore mos ber moloyo jalweny,
Igoyo ombulu mondo ongʼe gima ditim,
